response.job_title: Digital Analytics Media Manager at RaB2B
response.summary: I aim to generate value within the industry through its data resources. I believe that by correctly exploring, modeling, and analyzing data, I can assist in developing dynamic strategies to tackle this rapidly evolving world and ease decision-making. I offer innovative solutions and enthusiasm to learn at any stage of the road, which makes me a flexible coworker. I understand the importance of teamwork in accomplishing the most complex tasks, and I am used to experiencing challenging scenarios, enabling me to bring accurate and timely solutions.
response.skills: Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, Product Management, Investigación, Gestión de proyectos, Brand Development, Market Analysis, Marketing Strategy, Microsoft Office, Microsoft PowerPoint, Servicio de atención al cliente, Liderazgo de equipos, Inglés, Español

profile_positions.description:
•	Power BI expert within the company
•	Consulting presentations with the sales team
•	Training to different companies to embrace the program
•	Project development for clients and report maintenance
profile_positions.title: Analytics Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•Data processing from different digital media sources, data visualization (with tools like Power BI and Tableau), and insights creation for different deliverables for agency clients in USA.
•QA tealium tagging for site analysis
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Database management to carry out market-focused analysis to ease decision making
•	Lead brand high impact projects from the Marketing Area
•	Development of brand strategy, coordinating its execution in events, training, video recording of demos, creation of catalogs and support in communication materials and attention to sales channels
profile_positions.title: Marketing Analyist

profile_positions.description:
•	Participation on Lean Six Sigma Projects with high impact on the production plant
•	Provide support for the Focused Improvement area
profile_positions.title: TPM Intern

profile_positions.description:
•Academic monitor of the intersectional course “Logistic Perspectives”, taught by international guests
•Development of scientific articles and proposals for improvement for a food distribution program at the National Level
•Preparation of reports and analysis of quantitative and qualitative data on national logistics performance
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•Customer service in English and Spanish for US residents linked to a mobile phone company
•Floor support for other agents
•Supervisor
profile_positions.title: Customer Service

company.name: RAB2B | Rabinovici + Associates
company.description:
RAB2B orchestrates better outcomes by helping clients rise above the clutter and make the most out of their greatest opportunities.

We’re B2B specialists, performance experts, creatives, content creators and strategists who collaborate with you to connect the dots, and create impact, across every touchpoint of today’s complex customer journeys.

Let’s start building the foundation of trust it takes to translate your toughest, most complex challenges into high-impact actions that enable you to make big gains on your stretch goals.

Learn more about us at rab2b.com
